channel.title: Comments on: Five Google Wave Invitations are up for grabs
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: unlimited
item.dc:creator: unlimited
item.description: Hi there, anyone got a spare invite? Please share! ;) Cheers!
item.content:encoded:
Hi there, anyone got a spare invite? Please share! ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Rajavel
item.dc:creator: Rajavel
item.content:encoded:
Google didn’t pick me yet so I am just throwing my name here..hoping you draw my name!

@rajavel

item.title: By: MetaSam
item.dc:creator: MetaSam
item.description: I'd like a Google Wave invite to know what the hype is all about and have a glimpse about the future of communications on the web as seen by Google!
item.content:encoded: I’d like a Google Wave invite to know what the hype is all about and have a glimpse about the future of communications on the web as seen by Google!

item.title: By: misterjp
item.dc:creator: misterjp
item.content:encoded:
I will keep some invites for the other participants. I can’t say how many at the moment, I am still waiting for Google to validate the invite and I don’t know how many invites I will get (if any).

JP.

item.title: By: fel
item.dc:creator: fel
item.content:encoded:
awwww… it would be nice if each one that won the invites invited one (or more) of the 40 of us that are still waiting!

thanks!

item.title: By: Colin Marcom
item.dc:creator: Colin Marcom
item.content:encoded:
I would LOVE to check out G Wave to deploy for use in our produce business! I’m an OG (original gmailer) and Google Voice (formerly Grand Central) member who happily gave away invites when those were both invite only (Voice still being so)

Thanks for your consideration!

Colin
@ActaN0nVerba on the TWI to the TTER

item.title: By: Chip

item.description: I would be interested. Twitter name is: wookielnx
item.content:encoded: I would be interested. Twitter name is: wookielnx

item.title: By: Brad Paisley
item.dc:creator: Brad Paisley
item.description: @bpaisley69 NEEDS a google wave invitation so he can be the coolest cat on the block. Please oh Please pick me.
